DOC.brief_summary: This study aim determine maternal Fe status influence placental neonatal Fe status pregnant adolescent assess impact Fe endowment birth functional outcome assess auditory brainstem response within 48 h delivery neonate born adolescent .
DOC.brief_title: Impact Maternal Iron Status Neonatal Iron Status Auditory Brainstem Response Newborn
DOC.criteria: Adolescents ( age 1118 ) newborns eligible participate adolescent carry singleton pregnancy , preexist medical complication ( HIVinfection , eat disorder , hemoglobinopathy , malabsorption disease , steroid use , substance abuse history , take medication know influence iron homeostasis ) . Individuals pregnancy induce hypertension elevate diastolic blood pressure ( > 110 ) eligible participate study . In addition , adolescents previously treat lead exposure , identify elevate blood lead concentration childhood , exclude study . Data infant experience perinatal asphyxia , pathologic neonatal hyperbilirubinemia , respiratory disease , antibiotic therapy ( aminoglycosides ) , CNS infection , sepsis , congenital middle external ear lesion , craniofacial anomaly , chromosomal disorder , TORCH ( toxoplasmosis , infection , rubella , cytomegalovirus infection herpes simplex infection ) clinically unstable first 48 h postdelivery exclude ABR study . Infants born mother positive drug abuse screen delivery also exclude study ( screen automatically run among age group ) . Infants identify hear deficit birth use OAE screen exclude ABR measure .
